snippet: Recent talk of turning a string of northern cities into a regional powerhouse has highlighted how the outlines of England's north-south divide have shifted.
abstract: Letter from Europe; promise by George Osborne, Britain's chancellor of the Exchequer, to turn string of northern cities into regional powerhouse highlights how the outlines of England's north-south divide have shifted.
lead_paragraph: Recent talk of turning a string of northern cities into a regional powerhouse has highlighted how the outlines of England's north-south divide have shifted.

headline.print_headline: Tories Hope to Lure North of England
headline.main: Tories Hope to Lure North of England
